Reviews.Title: “Had a grand time an excellent hotel and got the best rate and top notch customer service!”
Reviews.Author: Gicelle
Reviews.Content: overdue review family travelled usa december 2009 trip 3 nights stay wilshire plaza hotel highly recommended relatives live chosen rate location accessibility main attractions travelled sisters family sets parents party consisted 13 people booked 4 price paying didnt expect hotel definitely provided services beyond expectations read bad reviews trip bothered bit luckily decided ahead plan am happy wilshire plaza exceeded expections hotel maybe litttle found clean presentable little classy service received concierge front desk manager vic 5 star level kids oldies alike time staying hotel definitely recommend people 100 stay hotel
